subject: Migrate auth from Supabase to Firebase + fix TypeScript errors
body:
Auth Migration:
- Add Firebase SDK and client config (src/lib/firebase.ts)
- Create FirebaseAuthManager implementing IAuthManager interface
- Update User store to use FirebaseAuthManager
- Update AuthCallback for Firebase redirect handling
- Update device API for Firestore persistence
- Remove Supabase client, auth manager, and dependencies
- Update .env with Firebase configuration

TypeScript Fixes:
- Add missing amount/destAddress to TYPED_MESSAGE transactions
- Fix BackupDialog Date constructor with undefined fallback
- Remove 15 unused @ts-expect-error directives across stores

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Migrate auth from Supabase to Firebase + fix TypeScript errors
